title: So many arrests; even more distractions
selftext:
Okay. Since morning, we’ve been seeing reports of several activists being arrested or detained across India. 

https://thewire.in/rights/nia-raids-62-andhra-pradesh-telangana-maoist

https://www.thequint.com/news/india/delhi-police-raids-journalists-newsclick-probe-phones-laptop-seized

This literally happened the day after Gandhi Jayanthi. Such naked display of fear disguised as arrogance. 

Apparently, there’s arguments that this was done to distract from the issues of caste census. 

https://www.thequint.com/news/politics/fascism-distraction-from-bihar-caste-survey-india-bloc-reacts-newsclick-raids

The dispensation was assuming that by distracting the people they would be able to skim through their failures. But like, people come on, be distracted by something like intentional wardrobe malfunctions of hot celebs, not flexing of state power on useless students and activists.

Anyway, let’s make a list of better things to be distracted by.

 /rant
